src:
Ima još četiri hiljade karata
Na Marakani se nadaju punom stadionu

06 Nov 2019

Skupe cene ulaznica i paketa za mečeve Lige šampiona uticale su da se ne traži karta više za večerašnji meč Crvene zvezde protiv Totenhema. U susretu sa Olimpijaksom na Marakani okupilo se tek nešto više od 40.000 ljudi, što je za Zvezdine standarde malo.
Večeras će biti mnogo više ljudi, ali sigurno je da najveći srpski stadion neće biti krcat kao protiv Jang Bojsa kada nije moglo da se diše.
Crvena zvezda je prodala oko 30.000 paketa, kao i 10.000 pojedinačnih ulaznica za večerašnji meč protiv Totenhema. Kada se tome dodaju i sponzorske ulaznice, i deo koji pripada UEFA dolazi se do zaključaka da je na blagajnama Marakane ostalo još oko četiri hiljade karata. Zbog toga su na zvaničnom sajtu još jednom obavetili javnost da mogu da nabave ulaznicu.„Podrška, kao i uvek je preko potrebna našim momcima, koji su pokazali da dobiju krila kada ih prati huk sa tribina Marakane. Do sada je prodato više karata u odnosu na meč sa Olimpijakosom, tako da se očekuje veći broj zaljubljenika u crveno-beli dres. Karata je ostalo još jako malo, zato zvezdaši požurite na blagajne stadiona po dragoceno parče papira i budite deo istorije“, stoji na sajtu Crvene zvezde.
Najslabiji ide VIP deo zapada.
text:
There are four thousand more tickets
They are hoping for a full stadium at Marakana

06 Nov 2019

Expensive ticket and package prices for Champions League matches have made it no longer necessary to ask for a ticket anymore for tonight's Red Star match against Tottenham. Just over 40,000 people gathered to meet the Olympics in Maracana, which is small for Star standards.
There will be many more people tonight, but it is certain that Serbia's largest stadium will not be as crowded as it was against Young Boys when he couldn't breathe.
The Red Star has sold about 30,000 packages, as well as 10,000 individual tickets for tonight's match against Tottenham. When the sponsor tickets are added, the part belonging to UEFA concludes that there are about four thousand more tickets left at the Marakana box office. That's why they have once again informed the public on the official website that they can get a ticket. So far, more tickets have been sold compared to the Olympics, so more fans of the red and white jersey are expected. There are very few tickets left, so hurry the stars to the stadium coffers for a valuable piece of paper and be a part of history, ”the Red Star website reads.
The weakest goes the VIP part of the west.
